betterquesting:10.desc:8: Compared to the Crucible, the Smelter generates spellwaves in large quantities and is unavoidable, something that will be difficult to deal with until the player makes a tool to clean up the spellwaves, so please move the Smelter away from your base unless you want your base to be corrupted. \n\nYou can add auxiliary vents to the smelter to neutralize the spellwaves generated, but it's not a permanent solution, even the most powerful Void Source Mass Smelter in the original TC6, with 3 auxiliary vents, can't achieve 0 spellwave emissions. Of course, in this pack, you can continue to upgrade your smelter to "secret silver", which can stop spellwave generation, but that's for the later stages, when you'll be able to deal with spellwave too. \To summarize, keep the smelter away from the base in the early stages.
